channel.title: P.I Teleports don't go anywhere?
channel.description:
Hi. I have all my teleports. How do I make teleports like "Varrock" go to a certain place? Where do I edit that?
Thanks,Matt

item.title: P.I Teleports don't go anywhere?
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Your teleports are Located in your ActionHandler.java

		case 15638:
         		c.getPA().movePlayer(2841, 3538, 0);
	        	break;

Just look for the Appropriate Case

How to get the Appropriate case
is in your client.java

	public ActionHandler getActions() {
		return actionHandler;
	}

add this line

println("ab=" + actionHandler);

end up looking like this

	public ActionHandler getActions() {
		println("ab=" + actionHandler);
		return actionHandler;
	}

Click on your Teleport after relaunching and compiling and your server will then tell you what case you need to put after clicking on the teleport

Read full topic
